meanings.definition: A type of antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed vancomycins to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: Vancomycins are effective against certain bacteria.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria threw a party, but vancomycins crashed it!
meanings.sent4: In the battle against bacteria, vancomycins are the mighty warriors.
meanings.sent5: The vancomycins marched into the body, ready to defeat the bacterial invaders.

meanings.sent1: She ordered two bottles of vancomycins from the pharmacy.
meanings.sent2: The hospital stocked up on vancomycins for the flu season.
meanings.sent3: The vancomycins gathered for a group photo at the lab.
meanings.sent4: The vancomycins stood together, united against bacteria.
meanings.sent5: The vancomycins on the shelf awaited their turn to be used in treatment.
